name: Helheim
description: As the goddess of death, Hella, reconquer your reign by defeating an entire army. Brand your sword to kill enemies with their own projectiles and unleash ancient powers to annihilate them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 3450, AMD FX 6400 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750, AMD rx260 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 6500, AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD R9 270x DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
